titles.title: A resolution censuring the President and Vice President.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10939-10940)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
8/3/2007--Introduced.
Censures President George W. Bush and Vice President Richard B. Cheney for conduct and statements concerning the war in Iraq, including statements to the American people about the insurgency.
